title: kerning issues in FontLab Studio
content:
for some reason my kerning will not export, I've messed with a few things and after reading a few forums posts and tutorials I'm still at a loss. I have open what I think are the most important windows, hopefully. Is there any chance it is caching? I installed it to see if it worked prior to kerning, I'm thinking this is a potential issues as well? don't think this is it since the font was changed, which worked but the kerning stayed the same.

[http://localhostr.com/files/ea1344/Picture+2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203154125/http:/localhostr.com/files/ea1344/Picture+2.jpg "http://localhostr.com/files/ea1344/Picture+2.jpg")
author: Lukasz

comments.content: Where does kerning not work? Which app, OS, version...?
Check out the last two posts on [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203154125/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42382).
